changes.change:
NEW FEATURES:
-Added "Immortal" option in addtion to retire & terminate
-Added force/haptic touch shortcut for each individual app


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-Indicates enabled app in "Manage Apps" using checkmark
-Fixed reset didn't invalidate currently all backgrounded apps
-Fixed native dots didn't get overriden when dot indicator is preferred
-Fixed expiration defaulted to zero when user leaved it empty after editing
-Some other fixes for CLI

NEW FEATURES:
-Added force/haptic touch shortcut for each individual app


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
-None
